nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.33.1 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:<VERSION>-k8s.v1.33.1 --platform=linux/<ARCH> -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/<ARCH> image-prefix/cluster:<VERSION>-k8s.v1.33.1
nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.32.5 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:<VERSION>-k8s.v1.32.5 --platform=linux/<ARCH> -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/<ARCH> image-prefix/cluster:<VERSION>-k8s.v1.32.5
nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.31.9 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:<VERSION>-k8s.v1.31.9 --platform=linux/<ARCH> -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/<ARCH> image-prefix/cluster:<VERSION>-k8s.v1.31.9
